name: Dotnet Runtime Exception Type Anomaly for {{exception_type.name}}
query: sum(last_4h):anomalies(sum:runtime.dotnet.exceptions.count{service:*} by {exception_type,service,subscription_id}.as_count(), 'agile', 2, direction='both', interval=60, alert_window='last_15m', seasonality='hourly', count_default_zero='true', timezone='utc') >= 1
message:
There is an anomaly in the number of exceptions of type {{exception_type.name}} on {{service.name}}.

See [dashboard](https://app.datadoghq.com/dash/integration/30412/net-runtime-metrics?tpl_var_service%5B0%5D={{service.name}}&live=true).
